messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Writer's Construct Tango. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: HOS Killed himself infront of me, now hiring a new HOS

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: WE HAVE NO SECUIRTY AND HOS IS DEAD

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: AI Rouge and is killing me, cya later kiddos
